name: createFieldConfigurationScheme
description:
Creates a field configuration scheme.

This operation can only create field configuration schemes used in company-managed (classic) projects.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

body.description: The details of the field configuration scheme.

$block: Details of a field configuration scheme.

$ul: **description**: The description of the field configuration scheme.
**id**: The ID of the field configuration scheme.
**name**: The name of the field configuration scheme.
